name: LaserCAT
description: LaserCAT is a unique oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES Club. With its classic box and buttons design, LaserCAT stands out with its cat-like arms and legs. Its screen emits a powerful laser that can analyze and display intricate waveforms with precision. LaserCAT is a combination of vintage aesthetic and advanced technology, making it a beloved companion for any electronics enthusiast.
